div.l: Wich that I help my fadir͗e for to stele
And good lemman God the save and kepe
And with that word she gan for to wepe
Aleyn vp rist and thoght or it dawe
I wol go crepe in be my felawe
And felt the Cradil with his hond a none
Be God thoght he al wrong have I gone
Myn hede is toty of my swynk al nyght
That makith me that I go nat a right
I woot wele be the cradil I have mys go
Her͗e lijth the myller͗e and his wyfe also
And forth he goith a twenty dewil wey
Vnto the bed ther͗e as the myller lay
He went have cropyn by his felowe Iohn
And by the myller he crepith in a non̄
He kauȝt him be the nek and soft spak
He seid þowe Iohn thowe swynyshede a wake
For Cristis soule and here a nobil game
For by that lord that callid is seynt Iame
As I have thryis in this short nyght
Swywyd the myller͗e his doghter bolt vp right
Whylis thowe hast as a coward ben̄ a gast
Ye fals harlot quod the myller hast
A fals treytour͗e a fals clerk seid he
Thowe shalt be dede be goddis dignyte
Who dare be so bold for to disperage
My doghter that is com of such lynage
And by the throte bol he caght aleyn̄
And he hem dispitously a gayn̄
And on the nose he smote him with his fist
Doun̄ ran the blode streme oppon his brest
And in the flore with nose and mowth to broke
They walowid as done to piggis in a poke
And vp they goon and doun a geyn a none
Tyl that the myller͗e stombelit atta stone
And doun̄ he fil bakward on his wyfe
That wist no thing of that nyse stryfe
For she was ful of slepe a lityl wight
